name: LAMBorghini
description:
Welcome to Lamborghini

You are driving in a far away race track. But you are not alone! There is another player, which you are tied to. Try to succeed the track without gathering too many points in Pelzburg. If you have too many points you will lose the game and have to restart. There is also some Ouzo laying around which might affect you, but do not drink and drive!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Ctrl - Remove Rope for a few seconds

Spacebar - Drift/Handbrake

H - Honk

R - Reset

To start another race you have to restart the game.

Credits
